content: I have 135 USDT (TRC20) to convert into BTC. Addy:Code:39yNcZqiAr3hp4ayvWXZXTCjteRbvME6Zchttps://blockchair.com/bitcoin rate reference once you send the btc. PM me your USDT address I will send the USDT after receiving the btc.Please contact be on Telegram before sending the btc in case I already exchanged them.Cheers,

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: If you have usdt and want btc why not just convert it from binance instead of dealing here, Im sure you are using the exchange ? and there is zero spot fee too

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: Edwardard on November 27, 2022, 10:05:15 AMIf you have usdt and want btc why not just convert it from binance instead of dealing here, Im sure you are using the exchange ? and there is zero spot fee too It's simple. I don't want my exchange (if I am using any) address to be known to the public even the one who will do the exchange.
